comment: The person with whom I planned to prep for gate and ese ... lol never started with him,
name: Harsh Jha

comment: You are one of my closest, favorite and bosom buddy. You have supported me throughout my semester. Because of you I passed in exams and got good cpi. I know, You have faced very very tough time during academic but you manenged all that's great. You always hold a special place in my heart ♥️🥰❤️‍🔥
name: Amol Aakarsh

comment: Sunny's a total go-getter, always grinding away! Plus, he's not just about work—he's got your back and is always down to lend a hand. Lucky to call him a flatmate!😃😃😃
name: Badal

comment: Sunny is very hardworking, he has helped in every exam, keep working like this, one day we want to see you as an IES I know, You have faced very very tough time during academic but you managed Lucky to call him a flatmate!😃😃😃 All best bro for your bright future
name: Namonarayan meena

comment:
I even can't imagine myself in a situation in which u fought during 3rd semester. Efforts with which u came upon & ur dedication is really appreciable. My pleasure to be known to a person like u. Thankful to u for those assignments and reports. 
Best wishes, may god give u courage to meet ur dreams.
name: Sanskar Gupta

comment: Hoshyaari me to koi tod hai nhi sunny bhai aur aashiqui me bhi sabse aage hai. Gussa iska Kab 0 se 100 jaaye bhagwaan ko bhi nhi pata. Dedicated banda kisi cheez pe ad jaaye to Pura Karke hi maanega. Teri gaali ke accent ke kya hi kehene Aur Hamesha khush rehna.
name: Yogesh Mohan Dantare

comment: Best of luck for everything bro. Be happy and have fun.
name: Samrat Telse
